body:
I don't know if its just me or there is a lot less players than there use to be.
I remember when elimination servers use to be full now i never get enough players to start a match.
I mean ever since all these changes happened no 1 ik plays as much. Tell me what you think about this

title: Drop in players

replies.body: I also have seen a great amount of players that just seem to stop playing... i don't know why tho, then again there are many, many servers among the Minecraft community.
replies.body_tagged: I also have seen a great amount of players that just seem to stop playing... i don't know why tho, then again there are many, many servers among the Minecraft community.

replies.body:
People saying they have things to do, it's right . And they leaving ( include staff ).
When you asking this about staff, The other people saying 'People coming and people leaving', it's right about the staff, But about the players..... :(
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body: Yea, I still haven't managed to play certain gamemodes because no-one is on... Honestly I'm not sure how this can be fixed, the only popular servers seem to be Nebula and The Walls...
replies.body_tagged: Yea, I still haven't managed to play certain gamemodes because no-one is on... Honestly I'm not sure how this can be fixed, the only popular servers seem to be Nebula and The Walls...

replies.body: I think avicus might be getting a bit old... I'm not saying it's a bad server, I'm saying people like to try new things and with giant giant giant servers like hypixel, where no game mode would ever be empty, people can be lured away. It's sad...
replies.body_tagged: I think avicus might be getting a bit old... I'm not saying it's a bad server, I'm saying people like to try new things and with giant giant giant servers like hypixel, where no game mode would ever be empty, people can be lured away. It's sad...

replies.body: Some people don't like to try new things like Skywars (which is non-existant) or Avicade though :c
replies.body_tagged: Some people don't like to try new things like Skywars (which is non-existant) or Avicade though :c

replies.body:
Man when McZone was here, there were HUGE amounts of people for Nebula, Walls, SG and Elimination and then an average amount for the others.
Were talking bout 300 - 500 more people coming on daily before than now...
so yes, Avicus has dropped people and in the last month, some of our most well known people have left as well :(
